verses.verse: כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus הִרְאַ֙נִי֙ <WH7200> shewed אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> Thus hath the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> and behold יוֹצֵ֣ר <WH3335> unto me and behold he formed גֹּבַ֔י <WH1462> grasshoppers בִּתְחִלַּ֖ת <WH8462> in the beginning עֲל֣וֹת <WH5927> of the shooting up הַלָּ֑קֶשׁ <WH3954> of the latter growth וְהִ֨נֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold לֶ֔קֶשׁ <WH3954> and lo [it was] the latter growth אַחַ֖ר <WH310> after גִּזֵּ֥י <WH1488> mowings הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king's

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> came אִם־ <WH518> when כִּלָּה֙ <WH3615> And it came to pass [that] when they had made an end לֶֽאֱכוֹל֙ <WH398> of eating אֶת־ <WH853> עֵ֣שֶׂב <WH6212> the grass הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> then I said אֲדֹנָ֤י <WH136> O Lord יְהוִה֙ <WH3068> GOD סְֽלַֽח־ <WH5545> forgive נָ֔א <WH4994> please מִ֥י <WH4310> How יָק֖וּם <WH6965> arise יַֽעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> I beseech thee by whom shall Jacob כִּ֥י <WH3588> for קָטֹ֖ן <WH6996> ? for he [is] small הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

נִחַ֥ם <WH5162> repented יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD עַל־ <WH5921> about זֹ֑את <WH2063> likewise לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become אָמַ֥ר <WH559> for this It shall not be saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus הִרְאַ֙נִי֙ <WH7200> shewed אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> Thus hath the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold קֹרֵ֛א <WH7121> called לָרִ֥ב <WH7378> to contend בָּאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> by fire אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> unto me and behold the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD וַתֹּ֙אכַל֙ <WH398> and it devoured אֶת־ <WH853> תְּה֣וֹם <WH8415> deep רַבָּ֔ה <WH7227> the great וְאָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> and did eat up אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵֽלֶק׃ <WH2506> a part

וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> Then said אֲדֹנָ֤י <WH136> I O Lord יְהוִה֙ <WH3069> GOD חֲדַל־ <WH2308> cease נָ֔א <WH4994> please מִ֥י <WH4310> How יָק֖וּם <WH6965> arise יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> I beseech thee by whom shall Jacob כִּ֥י <WH3588> for קָטֹ֖ן <WH6996> ? for he [is] small הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

נִחַ֥ם <WH5162> repented יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD עַל־ <WH5921> about זֹ֑את <WH2063> likewise גַּם־ <WH1571> too הִיא֙ <WH1931> This לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> become אָמַ֖ר <WH559> for this This also shall not be saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD ס

כֹּ֣ה <WH3541> Thus הִרְאַ֔נִי <WH7200> Thus he shewed וְהִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> and behold אֲדֹנָ֛י <WH136> me and behold the Lord נִצָּ֖ב <WH5324> stood עַל־ <WH5921> and חוֹמַ֣ת <WH2346> upon a wall אֲנָ֑ךְ <WH594> [made] by a plumbline וּבְיָד֖וֹ <WH3027> in his hand אֲנָֽךְ׃ <WH594> with a plumbline

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me מָֽה־ <WH4100> What אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you רֹאֶה֙ <WH7200> what seest עָמ֔וֹס <WH5986> unto me Amos וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> thou? And I said אֲנָ֑ךְ <WH594> A plumbline וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֲדֹנָ֗י <WH136> the Lord הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> I am about שָׂ֤ם <WH7760> Behold I will set אֲנָךְ֙ <WH594> a plumbline בְּקֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH7130> in the midst עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> of my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no אוֹסִ֥יף <WH3254> I will not again ע֖וֹד <WH5750> again עֲב֥וֹר <WH5674> pass by לֽוֹ׃

וְנָשַׁ֙מּוּ֙ <WH8074> shall be desolate בָּמ֣וֹת <WH1116> And the high places יִשְׂחָ֔ק <WH3446> of Isaac וּמִקְדְּשֵׁ֥י <WH4720> and the sanctuaries יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel יֶחֱרָ֑בוּ <WH2717> shall be laid waste וְקַמְתִּ֛י <WH6965> and I will rise עַל־ <WH5921> against בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> against the house יָרָבְעָ֖ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> with the sword פ

וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <WH7971> sent אֲמַצְיָה֙ <WH558> Then Amaziah כֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> the priest בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <WH1008> of Bethel אֶל־ <WH413> to יָרָבְעָ֥ם <WH3379> to Jeroboam מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying קָשַׁ֨ר <WH7194> hath conspired עָלֶ֜יךָ <WH5921> against עָמ֗וֹס <WH5986> Amos בְּקֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH7130> against thee in the midst בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לֹא־ <WH3808> is not תוּכַ֣ל <WH3201> is not able הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land לְהָכִ֖יל <WH3557> to bear אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דְּבָרָֽיו׃ <WH1697> all his words

כִּי־ <WH3588> For כֹה֙ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> saith עָמ֔וֹס <WH5986> For thus Amos בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> by the sword יָמ֣וּת <WH4191> shall die יָרָבְעָ֑ם <WH3379> Jeroboam וְיִ֨שְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> and Israel גָּלֹ֥ה <WH1540> shall surely יִגְלֶ֖ה <WH1540> be led away captive מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> and אַדְמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH127> out of their own land ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֲמַצְיָה֙ <WH558> Also Amaziah אֶל־ <WH413> to עָמ֔וֹס <WH5986> unto Amos חֹזֶ֕ה <WH2374> O thou seer לֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> Go בְּרַח־ <WH1272> flee thee away לְךָ֖ אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> into the land יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וֶאֱכָל־ <WH398> and there eat שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> and there לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> bread וְשָׁ֖ם <WH8033> and there תִּנָּבֵֽא׃ <WH5012> and prophesy

וּבֵֽית־ אֵ֔ל <WH1008> any more at Bethel לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no תוֹסִ֥יף <WH3254> not again ע֖וֹד <WH5750> again לְהִנָּבֵ֑א <WH5012> But prophesy כִּ֤י <WH3588> is a מִקְדַּשׁ־ <WH4720> chapel מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> for it [is] the king's ה֔וּא <WH1931> he וּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> court מַמְלָכָ֖ה <WH4467> and it [is] the king's הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he ס

וַיַּ֤עַן <WH6030> Then answered עָמוֹס֙ <WH5986> Amos וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲמַצְיָ֔ה <WH558> to Amaziah לֹא־ <WH3808> nor נָבִ֣יא <WH5030> I [was] no prophet אָנֹ֔כִי <WH595> I וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor בֶן־ <WH1121> son נָבִ֖יא <WH5030> neither [was] I a prophet's אָנֹ֑כִי <WH595> I כִּֽי־ <WH3588> I am a בוֹקֵ֥ר <WH951> but I [was] an herdman אָנֹ֖כִי <WH595> and a וּבוֹלֵ֥ס <WH1103> and a gatherer שִׁקְמִֽים׃ <WH8256> of sycomore fruit

וַיִּקָּחֵ֣נִי <WH3947> took יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD מֵאַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> me as I followed הַצֹּ֑אן <WH6629> the flock וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלַי֙ <WH413> and to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> and the LORD לֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> Go הִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> prophesy אֶל־ <WH413> to עַמִּ֥י <WH5971> unto my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> Now שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> Now therefore hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> thou the word יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you אֹמֵ֗ר <WH559> Thou sayest לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor תִנָּבֵא֙ <WH5012> Prophesy עַל־ <WH5921> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> not against Israel וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תַטִּ֖יף <WH5197> and drop עַל־ <WH5921> against בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> not [thy word] against the house יִשְׂחָֽק׃ <WH3446> of Isaac

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אִשְׁתְּךָ֞ <WH802> Thy wife בָּעִ֤יר <WH5892> in the city תִּזְנֶה֙ <WH2181> shall be an harlot וּבָנֶ֤יךָ <WH1121> and thy sons וּבְנֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1323> and thy daughters בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> by the sword יִפֹּ֔לוּ <WH5307> shall fall וְאַדְמָתְךָ֖ <WH127> and thy land בַּחֶ֣בֶל <WH2256> by line תְּחֻלָּ֑ק <WH2505> shall be divided וְאַתָּ֗ה <WH859> yourself עַל־ <WH5921> in אֲדָמָ֤ה <WH127> land טְמֵאָה֙ <WH2931> a polluted תָּמ֔וּת <WH4191> and thou shalt die וְיִ֨שְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> and Israel גָּלֹ֥ה <WH1540> shall surely יִגְלֶ֖ה <WH1540> go into captivity מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> and אַדְמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH127> forth of his land ס
